item.title: My Networking Meetings Don’t Lead Anywhere
Stock Market Investors Are Winning in the K-Shaped Economy
item.description: Consumer sentiment is falling while asset prices keep rising.

item.title: Beware the Coming Carnage in the Electric Vehicle Industry
item.description: Car buyers are no longer beating down dealers’ doors to get in line for the latest electric offerings, regardless of how smart the cars may be.

item.title: 2 Words Explain How the MacBook Air Quietly Became ‘The World’s Most Popular Business Laptop’
item.description: An interview with Apple’s Mac and Enterprise Marketing teams about the rise of the MacBook Air in unexpected places.

item.title: Why ‘Humble’ Leaders Tend to Be the Most Effective Leaders, Backed by Considerable Science
item.description: Don’t think you have all the answers? If you want to be a great leader, that’s a good thing.
